text: @DrRosena @wolri I have friends&relative's within Nhs.  One friend was transferred onto Covid19 ward to work. Reason being staff are getting ill due to lack of ppe. Staff given a plastic apron&a face mask. No eye protection not got respiratory protection. We are killing our Nhs with incompetence
